cu.explanation_en: Setting the AMF IP address to an invalid format will cause AMF connection failure and prevent NG interface setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting do CSIRS to an invalid value (2) will cause CSI-RS configuration errors and prevent proper channel state information transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將 do CSIRS 設定為無效值 (2)，會導致 CSI-RS 配置錯誤，並阻止正確的通道狀態資訊傳輸。
